title: carey1
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
I love baseball. But that level of physical activity can really do a number on my sciatica, so sometimes I prefer to just take a load off with an ice-cold beer and watch the game in my chair. But of course, I love doing other fun stuff that kids do! I love Fortnite! SnackChat! Slime!

[[Continue|careyquestions]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>

title: carey2
careyquestion1

Carey, your brother says you don’t play baseball with him anymore. Why is that?
